Package org.apache.fop.render.ps.extensions

Extensions specific to the PostScript Renderer.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AbstractPSCommentElement Base postscript commment element class
AbstractPSExtensionElement Base class for the PostScript-specific extension elements.
AbstractPSExtensionObject Base class for the PostScript-specific extension elements.
PSCommentAfter Custom postscript comment after class
PSCommentAfterElement Comment after element
PSCommentBefore Custom postscript comment before class
PSCommentBeforeElement Comment before element
PSExtensionAttachment This is the pass-through value object for the PostScript extension.
PSExtensionElementMapping This class provides the element mapping for the PostScript-specific extensions.
PSExtensionHandler ContentHandler (parser) for restoring PSExtension objects from XML.
PSExtensionHandlerFactory Factory for the ContentHandler that handles serialized PSSetupCode instances.
PSPageSetupCodeElement Extension element for fox:ps-page-setup-code.
PSSetPageDevice Element for postscript setpagedevice instruction This is a an extension which provides a pass-through value dictionary object for the postscript setpagedevice instruction.
PSSetPageDeviceElement Extension element for ps:ps-setpagedevice.
PSSetupCode This is the pass-through value object for the PostScript extension.
PSSetupCodeElement Extension element for fox:ps-setup-code.
 

Package org.apache.fop.render.ps.extensions Description

Extensions specific to the PostScript Renderer.
